Highlighted Clause: Intellectual property rights 2.1 who owns the ip of the authorised user's messages and files?
Plain Language Summary: The intellectual property rights of messages and files shared by authorized users belong to the authorized users themselves unless there's a direct agreement stating otherwise.

Highlighted Clause: We do not yet offer contracted sla for availability of the services and your data.
Plain Language Summary: The service provider does not currently have a formal commitment to specific levels of availability for the services and user data.

Highlighted Clause: We may modify, suspend, or terminate your access to or use of our Services anytime for any reason.
Plain Language Summary: The service can be changed, suspended, or terminated at any time for any reason by the provider.

Highlighted Clause: For the sake of clarity, the authorised users are responsible for any breaches of the users terms they cause.
Plain Language Summary: Authorized users are responsible for any breaches of the terms of service due to their actions.

Highlighted Clause: Element will not be liable for any loss that you may incur as a result of someone else using your password or account.
Plain Language Summary: The service provider is not responsible for any losses that occur if someone else uses your account or password.

Highlighted Clause: We expect planned downtime to be infrequent but will endeavor to provide the customer with advance notice.
Plain Language Summary: Planned interruptions to the service will be communicated in advance whenever possible.

Highlighted Clause: you acknowledge and agree that element shall not be liable for any failure to store your materials on the homeserver at any time.
Plain Language Summary: The service provider is not responsible for any failure to store user materials on the server.

Highlighted Clause: 4.3 data protection and processing We will ensure to set-up, at a minimum, reasonable data practices for maintaining the confidentiality and security of the customer's and user's data and preventing unauthorized access.
Plain Language Summary: The service provider promises to maintain reasonable data protection practices to ensure the security and confidentiality of customer and user data.

Highlighted Clause: The customer can terminate the subscription at any time, although the fees for the plan for the billing period are not refundable.
Plain Language Summary: Customers can cancel their subscription whenever they want, but they won't get a refund for the billing period they've already paid for.

Highlighted Clause: We reserve the right to suspend the communication service immediately and without notice if we determine, in our sole judgment, that the service is being used in violation of applicable law.
Plain Language Summary: The service provider can suspend the service immediately without notice if it is being used illegally.

Highlighted Clause: To the extent permissible, any implied warranties are limited to ninety days.
Plain Language Summary: Implied warranties are only valid for 90 days, unless the law states otherwise.

Highlighted Clause: We may terminate the contract immediately on notice to customer if we reasonably believe that the services are being used by customer or its authorized users in violation of applicable law.
Plain Language Summary: The service agreement can be terminated immediately if the provider believes the customer is using the service in violation of the law.

Highlighted Clause: By posting or uploading their messages or files, authorised users represent and warrant that they own or otherwise control all of the intellectual property rights and other rights to their user materials.
Plain Language Summary: By sharing messages or files, users confirm that they have the rights to the intellectual property in those materials.

Highlighted Clause: Indemnity and liability you agree to indemnify and hold element and its officers, co-branders, other partners and employees harmless from any claim or demand, including reasonable attorneys' fees, made by any third party due to or arising out of your user materials.
Plain Language Summary: Users agree to protect the service provider against any legal claims related to their content.

Highlighted Clause: Limitation of liability in no event shall element, its officers, directors, employees, partners or suppliers be liable to you or any third party for any special, punitive, incidental, indirect or consequential damages or losses of any kind, or any damages or losses whatsoever.
Plain Language Summary: The service provider and its affiliates are not liable for any sort of damages or losses that users might experience from using the service.

Highlighted Clause: Federated users do not contribute to the mau total count and are free, but their activity does contribute to the resource usage of the host.
Plain Language Summary: Users from other servers ("federated users") don't count toward the total number of active users, but they still use the server's resources.
